.node-icon i {
    display: block;
    line-height: 40px;
    background: #21232b;
    opacity: 1;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    border-radius: 100%;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.nexxe-avatar-border {
    background: #090a0c;
}
.node-body {
    display: table;
    table-layout: fixed;
    width: 100%;
    background: rgba(29,31,39,0.16);
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 8px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
}
.p-navSticky.is-sticky {
    box-shadow: 0px 4px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.07000000000000001);
    background-color: rgba(15,16,20,0.92);
    backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
    transition: all .2s ease 0s;
}
.forums-stats--score {
    background: #21232b;
}
.forums-stats--text {
    border: 1px solid #1d1e25;
    border-radius: 30px;
    font-size: 12px;
    font-weight: 300;
    padding: 8px 12px;
    color: #888b98;
    text-transform: lowercase;
}
.block-header {
    color: #fff;
}
.block-header a:before {
    color: #fff;
}
//footer
.nexxe-footer-breadcrumb {
	display: none;
}
.nexxe-footer--content {
	display: none;
}
.nexxe-footer--bottom-background {
    background: black;
}
